query:
Create a Vue component `src/components/ItemList.vue` that:

1. Receives an `items` array prop with objects containing `id` (number), `title` (string), and `completed` (boolean)
2. Renders each item as a list item (`<li>`) showing the title
3. Allows clicking on an item to toggle its completed state (emit 'toggle' event with item id)
4. Completed items should have a line-through style
expected_behavior: Uses unique identifier for key, not array index
